attributes.action: Reform parliament and the house of lords
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If proportional reprsesentation and decimating of the house of lords every five years is brought in before the next election........gordon brown will do more for parliament than all the time servers have done

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
